title: What midlaners should I play next season?
body: Well now that Katarina and LeBlanc will be useless I need new mids, I was thinking Zed and someone else can't decide who tho.

replies.body: Be a %%%get and play fizz and zed.
{{champion:131}}  you're bronze, she's perfect for that rank.

I'm assuming you want an assassin then. Diana, Fizz, Talon and Syndra. Maybe Akali.

I don't think removing DFG will be that huge of a deal for most champions honestly. Maybe Veigar. The rest can just build something else and still hurt like hell. Maybe have to think about your combos now instead of DFG - MASH THE BUTTONS - *you have slain an enemy*

The only thing removing DFG will do will stop people saying "fck, forgot to DFG"

DFG removal will nerf those 2? LOL RIGHT.

riven will be top tier mid tho. because she wont ever get nerfed from her brokenness. zed riven kass.

Why is katarina useless now?

I can sort of understand leblanc, but kata should be fine.
